iconAlt.2: Artist palette icon for Design phase

steps.title: Discovery
steps.description: You fill out a quick form to describe your idea, features, and target audience.

steps.title: Proposal
steps.description: I prepare a clear roadmap with time, cost, and recommended tech.

steps.title: Design
steps.description: I create modern mockups in Figma based on your vision. I'll also provide a branded design kit.

steps.title: Development
steps.description: I build the site or app using React, Python, or modern stacks optimized for speed.

steps.title: Launch
steps.description: I handle deployment to live servers and ensure a smooth rollout.

steps.title: Maintenance
steps.description: I provide ongoing support, updates, and improvements to keep your project running smoothly.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Who's Behind S.N.P?
about.description: I'm a solo developer with years of experience in AI, full-stack development, and software for government and defense industries. I code smart, work fast, and speak tech fluently‚Äîso you don't have to.
